Text: The Exeter Inn (also known as The Inn at Exeter) is an inn in Exeter, New Hampshire, United States.
Triplets:<The Exeter Inn
1:
Text: Exeter Inn:  Located on Front Street on the campus of Phillips Exeter Academy, the Georgian style complex was built in 1932 and mirrors the school's architectural motif.

<Text: Exeter Inn:  Guests, which include many parents of Academy students, enjoy its walking distance proximity to historic downtown Exeter.>
